content: {"locationId": "1715", "organizationId": "1562", "name": "Signer Senior Center", "address1": "113 West Orchard St", "address2": "", "city": "Arcadia", "state": "MO", "zipCode": "63621", "country": null, "phone": "314-517-4445", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "37.5872792", "longitude": "-90.6303735", "foodPrograms": "Other", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "Located across the street from City Hall in Arcadia, MO.  We are a heating and cooling center as well as emergency shelter in times of a disaster, i.e., bad storms, tornadoes, electric outages.", "notes": "", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "314-517-4445", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 17, "regionName": "St. Louis Area Foodbank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "2663eb40-ca6e-413e-8ab2-bf60bbdd2771.jpg", "website": "https://stlfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": [], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
